content:
You may have seen an email announcing that the May Connectathon and WGM will now be virtual again. The WGM will be Monday, May 9 - Friday, May 13.
Do you want the Connectathon to be the week immediately preceding? Or would you like a week in between? We need to determine this quickly so we can get the page up.
the week before works for me. IHE is meeting the week before that (April 25-29).

I brought this up on the TSC planning call today and they were supportive of going the week before, especially in light of John's comment about IHE. If no one objects here soon, I will forward that proposal on to Mark so we can get the page up and running.
I think May 2-4 makes the most sense.
